title: Falling Asleep
transcript:
[Cueball gets into bed.]
It's so much easier
falling asleep[Megan is lying in bed, gripping her pillow.]
With you beside meâ€”[Cueball is lying on his back in bed.]
All the incentive I need[Full shot of the bed, Megan is on the left, gripping the pillow, Cueball is as far to the right as possible, nearly falling off, facing away from her.]
To leave the world behind.
